title: Liverpool Fans Can't Believe Who Jurgen Klopp Wants To Sign
text:
Liverpool Fans Can't Believe Who Jurgen Klopp Wants To Sign Wed Feb 08 2017 18:39:02   18:39:02 GMT+0000 (GMT) Nasir Jabbar Nasir Jabbar in football 
Not only were Liverpool booted out of two domestic competitions in the space of a few days last month, but they're now also out of the title running, needless to say, summer acquisitions are needed. 
But the Liverpool faithfuls may be a bit perturbed by Jurgen Klopp's transfer target. According to reports, he's plotting a surprising move for Gaston Ramirez. 
The Middlesbrough midfielder was hellbent on leaving in January during the transfer window but failed to secure his move away. (Ramirez made the permanent switch following a successful loan spell) 
In spite of handing in a transfer request. Though it appears his days at the Riverside are numbered with Liverpool plotting a summer swoop. 
Premier League champions Leicester City were hoping to tie up a deal but Aitor Karanka didn't succumb to the Foxes or the players pressure. (Ramirez joined the Saints for a reported ÂŁ12 million in 2012) 
Karanka has firm on this stance that the 26-year-old was not for sale as he remains an important player for the club. 
Yet, if a big-money offer is tabled in the summer, they may eventually sell up. And per TuttoMercatoWeb , Klopp has already held informal talks. 
The Uruguayan only joined them on a permanent deal last summer but could potentially be in line to appear for his fourth English side following spells with Southampton, Hull City and Boro. Sponsored Links
